title: A Puzzling Murder: Episode 244
description:
Nimal Samarasinha arrived in the UK from Sri Lanka in the 1970's. Along with his wife Florence, he worked hard in his role as an engineer to provide the very best for his daughter Michelle.

Then one January morning in 1992 everything changed when Nimal was murdered at their home.

Just who would possibly have wanted to hurt mild-mannered Nimal?
